statements: SELECT agency_name, airline_relationships, hotel_relationships FROM luxury_travel_agency WHERE agency_id = 1
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_agency WHERE agency_name = 'Luxury Travel Co.'
SELECT agency_id, agency_name, hotel_relationships FROM luxury_travel_agency WHERE agency_id > 3
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_agency ORDER BY agency_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM luxury_travel_agency
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_agency ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM luxury_travel_agency WHERE agency_id > 5 AND agency_id < 10;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM luxury_travel_agency WHERE agency_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT agency_id, airline_relationships FROM luxury_travel_agency WHERE JSON_LENGTH(airline_relationships) > 0;
SELECT agency_id, agency_name FROM luxury_travel_agency WHERE agency_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM airlines;
SELECT name, airfare FROM airlines WHERE airfare > 1000;
SELECT id, name FROM airlines WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM hotels ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM hotels WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT * FROM airlines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, airfare FROM airlines WHERE airfare > 200.00;
SELECT * FROM hotels WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location, rating FROM hotels WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%';
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(*) AS num_hotels FROM hotels;
SELECT * FROM airlines WHERE fleet_size > 100
SELECT name, headquarters FROM airlines ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, location, rating FROM hotels WHERE rating >= 4.5
SELECT * FROM tour_operators WHERE commission_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, contact_person FROM tour_operators
SELECT * FROM airlines WHERE headquarters = 'NYC';
SELECT name, fleet_size FROM airlines WHERE fleet_size > 100 ORDER BY fleet_size DESC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM hotels WHERE rating >= 4.0 AND location IN ('Paris', 'London') ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM tour_operators WHERE commission_rate BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT contact_person FROM tour_operators WHERE name LIKE '%travel%';
SELECT * FROM airlines;
SELECT airline_name, type FROM airlines ORDER BY type DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, rating FROM hotels WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT operator_name, contact_info FROM tour_operators WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM exclusive_deals WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM airlines WHERE type = 'International';
SELECT airline_name, type FROM airlines ORDER BY airline_name ASC;
SELECT h.hotel_name, h.location, e.price FROM hotels h JOIN exclusive_deals e ON h.hotel_id = e.hotel_id WHERE e.price < 1000;

SELECT o.operator_name, o.contact_info, COUNT(*) AS deals_count FROM tour_operators o JOIN exclusive_deals e ON o.operator_id = e.operator_id GROUP BY o.operator_name, o.contact_info HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT a.airline_name, h.hotel_name, o.operator_name FROM airlines a JOIN exclusive_deals e ON a.airline_id = e.airline_id JOIN hotels h ON h.hotel_id = e.hotel_id JOIN tour_operators o ON o.operator_id = e.operator_id WHERE e.start_date < '2023-01-01' AND e.end_date > '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM airlines
SELECT airline_name, airline_rating FROM airlines ORDER BY airline_rating DESC
SELECT hotel_name, hotel_rating FROM hotels WHERE hotel_rating > 4.5
SELECT * FROM tour_operators ORDER BY tour_operator_name ASC
SELECT package_name, package_description, package_price FROM packages WHERE package_price < 1000
SELECT * FROM airlines ORDER BY airline_rating DESC;
SELECT package_id, package_name, package_price FROM packages WHERE package_price > 1000;
SELECT deal_name, deal_discount FROM deals WHERE deal_discount BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT airlines.airline_name, hotels.hotel_name, packages.package_name FROM airlines JOIN packages ON airlines.airline_id = packages.airline_id JOIN hotels ON packages.hotel_id = hotels.hotel_id;

SELECT tour_operators.tour_operator_name, deals.deal_name, packages.package_price FROM tour_operators JOIN packages ON tour_operators.tour_operator_id = packages.tour_operator_id JOIN deals ON packages.package_id = deals.package_id;
